name: Aren
appearance: Hair dusted with glass slivers, thin callused hands, a humming reed-glass pendant at the throat.
character: Shy but passionate about sound; words come easier when glass is singing.
talents: teaches glass to remember a tune
hears dissonance when someone lies near his work
dreams: present an aria-window in the Prism Citadel
craft armor that sings arrows wide
earn Matron Selya Thorn's approval with a masterwork
secrets: burns mothwax illegally in demos for sacred resonance
keeps sootglass shards to study forbidden tones
sheltered a Veil courier after a raid
